apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the dark skin tone heart hands emoji forms a beautifully crafted symbol of love and care. The hands, rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and soft highlights, are gently cupped to create a perfect heart shape. This emoji radiates warmth and sincerity, symbolizing deep affection, self-love, or a heartfelt appreciation, all with the vibrant and tactile appearance found on Apple devices.
